q: World journalist Sean Hoare that Andy Coulson presided over a culture of phone hacking while he was in charge, he released a statement in which he "emphatically denied" the claims. A spokesman for Andy Coulson said: Andy Coulson has today told the Metropolitan police that he is happy to voluntarily meet with them following allegations made by Sean Hoare . Mr Andy Coulson emphatically denies these allegations. He has, however, offered to talk to officers if the need arises and would welcome the opportunity to give his view on Mr Sean Hoare 's claims. 9 December 2010, Tommy Sheridan perjury trial: Asked about Glenn Mulcaire 's repeated hacking of private mobile phone messages for the News of the World, Andy Coulson said: "I never knew him as an

Jackie Walorski said she expected Mike Pence to abide by Mitch Daniels ' wishes. He and I are aligned virtually down the line on conservative and fiscal issues. I'm excited for any door Mike Pence walks through, she said. "Obviously it'd be great for the state of Indiana." Mike Pence is from Columbus and was an attorney before running unsuccessfully for Congress against Democrat Phil Sharp in 1988 and 1990.

Rep. Mike Pence ( R-IN), framed it as an effort to deny government funding for abortions. "The time has come to deny all federal funding to Planned Parenthood of America," Mike Pence said. I've authored the Title X Abortion Provider Prohibition Act, which would deny Title X funds to Planned Parenthood or any other abortion provider and Congress must act and act now to move this important legislation. Jodi Jacobson, editor-in-chief of the reproductive health news site RH Reality Check, reports that "Title X provides millions of women across the country with access to basic primary and preventive care,

While Troy Aikman has been impressed by both Aaron Rodgers and Ben Roethlisberger this season, he gave credit to another standout quarterback, the Eagles' Michael Vick . I never would have dreamed that he could have played the way that he played, Troy Aikman said. "I know how much time and effort he put into making that happen, and so he should feel proud... I think it was one of those great stories of the NFL.
